issue.title: [C++] Create lightweight utilities for manipulating primitive arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16166](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16166). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I'm working with `[~michalno]` to break up ARROW-14182 into smaller PRs to ease review.  This PR adds some general purpose utilities that make it easier to work with primitive arrays, avoiding shared_ptr and allocation overhead.
